to straighten upthings......i didn't know about the bombs, (how come all of
your characters get the attacks nobody can avoid?) but i'm guessing that he
caught them and took the explosion for his comrades.....Dracona isn't
outside the base, she is inside, you can't fire at her.....you can fie at
her autoguns and it's legal to take those out.....now to the RPG......
Scamrock ran all around, he was determined to ward of these
attackers.......he ran to the side to avoid the shots.....then waited forr
something else......Dracona knew one way to get rid of these
attackers.....she employed it......as the shot hit the base, the base
exploded in fire and disinidrated before everyone's eyes......Sinesis and
Sinister were hit by blast and knocked down......the base burnt down......
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 27, 2000 3:46 PM
Subject: Re: Fight


> Oblitertron/Scattershot/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer/Anubis/Hades:
>
> (TheCode, the charges Scattershot threw down, as I've repeatedly posted,
are
> set to explode on impact/contact.  So if Scamrock caught the charges, they
> would've blown up in his hand)
>
> Oblitertron yelled, a little confused from all the shots, firing off two
> plasma blasts from his rifle, and a quick burst of flames at the same time
at
> the base.
> -----------
> Scattershot flew to the left dodging some stray shots, aiming at Scamrock,
> pullin the trigger back, letting loose 25 exploding rounds.
> -----------
> Unitron raised his laser rifles, firing four shots off at Sinister, four
off
> at Sinesis (four from each rifle in other words).
> ----------
> Shuko raised his rocket launcher, firing off his laser missile at the
> People's base, taking out two charges set to explode on impact, sighing,
> really not wanting to waste them on this worthless encampment.
> ---------
> Anubis fired off three plasma blasts at Dracona, getting hit in the left
arm
> by two autogun shots.
> --------
> Hades fired off three shots from his laser rifle at an autogun.
> --------
> Nemesis Enforcer raised his missile launcher, firing his last rocket off
at
> the People's base, activating his com.  <Lord Zardus, the base is nearly
> gone, I request more troops, or would you like us to brake off?  If we
were
> to come back and repair, by the time we attacked again, we could easily
crush
> them due to extensive damaged caused by us>
>
